Title: Establishes the "Purple Star School Program" to assist military-connected students and to recognize the value of military service and civic responsibility
Summary: Establishes the "Purple Star School Program" to assist military-connected students and to recognize the value of military service and civic responsibility.
LawCode: Add Art 66-A ยง3330, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing the "Purple Star School Program" to emphasize the importance of assisting military-connected students and to recognize the value of military service and civic responsibility
